item.title: [COLOR=white]The Godfather[/COLOR]
item.summary: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Godfather: Part II[/COLOR]
item.summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Godfather: Part III[/COLOR]
item.summary: Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

item.title: [COLOR=white]GoodFellas[/COLOR]
item.summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Casino[/COLOR]
item.summary: In Las Vegas, two best friends - a casino executive and a mafia enforcer - compete for a gambling empire and a fast-living, fast-loving socialite.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Scarface[/COLOR]
item.summary: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Irishman[/COLOR]
item.summary: An illustration of Frank Sheeran's life, from W.W.II veteran to hit-man for the Bufalino crime family and his alleged assassination of his close friend Jimmy Hoffa.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Once Upon a Time in America[/COLOR]

meta.title: Once Upon a Time in America

item.summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Donnie Brasco[/COLOR]
item.summary: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the Mafia life--at the expense of his regular one.

item.title: [COLOR=white]My Cousin Vinny[/COLOR]
item.summary: Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Untouchables[/COLOR]
item.summary: During Prohibition, Treasury agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone, and assembles a small, incorruptible team to help him.

item.title: [COLOR=white]A Bronx Tale[/COLOR]
item.summary: Robert De Niro and Chazz Palminteri give captivating performances in this intense drama about a boy torn between his tough, hard-working father and a violent yet charismatic crime boss.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Gangster Squad[/COLOR]
item.summary: It's 1949 Los Angeles, the city is run by gangsters and a malicious mobster, Mickey Cohen. Determined to end the corruption, John O'Mara assembles a team of cops, ready to take down the ruthless leader and restore peace to the city.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Public Enemies[/COLOR]
item.summary: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson, and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

item.title: [COLOR=white]American Gangster[/COLOR]
item.summary: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Carlito's Way[/COLOR]
item.summary: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Gangs of New York[/COLOR]
item.summary: In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Road to Perdition[/COLOR]
item.summary: A mob enforcer's son in 1930s Illinois witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Capone[/COLOR]
item.summary: The story of the rise and fall of the infamous Chicago gangster Al Capone and the control he exhibited over the city during the prohibition years.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Jackie Brown[/COLOR]
item.summary: A flight attendant with a criminal past gets nabbed by the ATF for smuggling. Under pressure to become an informant against the drug dealer she works for, she must find a way to secure her future without getting killed.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Pulp Fiction[/COLOR]
item.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Reservoir Dogs[/COLOR]
item.summary: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Mobsters[/COLOR]
item.summary: From start to finish, this is a story of friendship between four street-wise mates who don't mind using violence to achieve the lives that they want. They trust no one but each other, which is vital to their success as mobsters.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Usual Suspects[/COLOR]
item.summary: The sole survivor of a pier shoot-out tells the story of how a notorious criminal influenced the events that began with five criminals meeting in a seemingly random police lineup.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Heat[/COLOR]
item.summary: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Blow[/COLOR]
item.summary: The story of how George Jung, along with the Medell√≠n Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Black Mass[/COLOR]
item.summary: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Departed[/COLOR]
item.summary: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Cop Land[/COLOR]
item.summary: The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Shot Caller[/COLOR]
item.summary: A newly released prisoner is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival gang on the streets of Southern California.

item.title: [COLOR=white]RocknRolla[/COLOR]
item.summary: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Layer Cake[/COLOR]
item.summary: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Mean Streets[/COLOR]
item.summary: A small-time hood tries to keep the peace between his friend Johnny and Johnny's creditors.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Outsider[/COLOR]
item.summary: An epic set in post-WWII Japan and centered on an American former G.I. who joins the yakuza.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Sexy Beast[/COLOR]
item.summary: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Miller's Crossing[/COLOR]
item.summary: Tom Reagan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Killing Them Softly[/COLOR]
item.summary: Jackie Cogan is an enforcer hired to restore order after three dumb guys rob a Mob protected card game, causing the local criminal economy to collapse.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Gomorrah[/COLOR]
item.summary: Scampia Vele is the Corbusian architecture which has become a stronghold for Mafia of Naples, Italy.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Eastern Promises[/COLOR]
item.summary: A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Bugsy[/COLOR]
item.summary: The story of how Benjamin "Bugsy" Siegel started Las Vegas.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels[/COLOR]

meta.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels

item.summary: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Snatch[/COLOR]
item.summary: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Business[/COLOR]
item.summary: Frankie is sent from London to Spain to make a delivery to Charlie, who likes the kid and shows him the ropes including the use of guns and drugs. Frankie likes the sun, pools and the cute, bikini clad girls and stays in Spain.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Gangster No. 1[/COLOR]
item.summary: Chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent, and particularly ruthless English gangster.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Krays[/COLOR]
item.summary: This fact-based movie follows the life of the twin crime-lords in London's '60s underworld.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Legend[/COLOR]
item.summary: Identical twin gangsters Ronald and Reginald Kray terrorize London during the 1960s.

item.title: [COLOR=white]King of New York[/COLOR]
item.summary: A drug kingpin is released from prison and seeks to take total control of the criminal underworld in order to give back to the community.

item.title: [COLOR=white]The Long Good Friday[/COLOR]
item.summary: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Cardboard Gangsters[/COLOR]
item.summary: A group of young Cardboard Gangsters attempt to gain control of the drug trade in Darndale, chasing the glorified lifestyle of money, power and sex.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Chopper[/COLOR]
item.summary: Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

item.title: [COLOR=white]New Jack City[/COLOR]
item.summary: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Menace II Society[/COLOR]
item.summary: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Boyz n the Hood[/COLOR]
item.summary: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Exit Wounds[/COLOR]
item.summary: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

item.title: [COLOR=white]Belly[/COLOR]
item.summary: Two young friends involved in organized crime and drug dealing find that their priorities differ.
